meanings.definition: A synthetic compound used as a non-nutritive sweetener.
meanings.sent1: The cyclamate added sweetness to the drink without adding calories.
meanings.sent2: I prefer using cyclamate instead of sugar in my coffee.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf sprinkled cyclamate all over the cookies, making them too sweet to eat!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as cyclamate, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The cyclamate's sweetness lingered on his tongue long after he finished the soda.
